name: SendIt
description: SendIt is a courier service that helps users deliver parcels to different destinations, SendIt provides courier quotes based on weight categories

scripts.build-routes: npm run clean-routes && cd dist && mkdir routes && babel .././routes/**.js -s -d routes
scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && cd dist && mkdir test && babel .././test/**.test.js -s -d test
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel src/app.js controllers/**.js sampleDatabase/**.js helpers/**.js -s -d dist && npm run build-test && npm run build-routes
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node bin/production
